data.title: Simcere UK
data.meta_description: Simcere UK  | 201 followers on LinkedIn. The European frontline of Simcere Pharmaceutical Group, to conduct business development activities worldwide | Simcere Pharmaceutical Group is a science-led Chinese pharmaceutical company with over 5000 employees. It is amongst the pioneering companies to develop and launch innovative drugs in China. Simcere is actively looking for innovative drug candidates in all stages in the therapeutic areas of oncology, CNS, autoimmune and infectious disease, as well as technology platform in cell therapy and artificial intelligence.
data.text:
